name: Vernon HALL, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 4th of June, 1998, the matter is dismissed for failure to proceed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
